00010 namespace MVCWebComponents;

00017 Class MVCException extends \Exception {
00018         
00025         public static $elementClasses = array(
00026                 'wrapper' => 'exception',
00027                 'heading' => 'exception-heading',
00028                 'message' => 'exception-message',
00029                 'context' => 'exception-context',
00030                 'trace-wrapper' => 'exception-trace',
00031                 'trace-row-even' => 'exception-trace-row-even',
00032                 'trace-row-odd' => 'exception-trace-row-odd'
00033         );
00034         
00041         public function getFormattedMsg() {
00042                 
00043                 $type = @end(explode('\\', get_class($this)));
00044                 $output = '<pre class="' . self::$elementClasses['wrapper'] . '">';
00045                 $output .= '<h1 class="' . self::$elementClasses['heading'] . "\">Unhandled Exception <i>$type</i></h1>";
00046                 $output .= '<p class="' . self::$elementClasses['message'] . '">' . $this->getMessage() . ' - Code: ' . $this->getCode() . '<br/>';
00047                 $output .= '<span class="' . self::$elementClasses['context'] . '">Triggered on line ' . $this->getLine() . ' in ' . $this->getFile() . '.</span></p>';
00048                 $output .= '<p class="' . self::$elementClasses['trace-wrapper'] . '">';
00049                 $i = count($this->getTrace());
00050                 foreach($this->getTrace() as $trace) {
00051                         @$output .= '<span class="' . self::$elementClasses['exception-trace-row-' . ($i % 2 == 0 ? 'even' : 'odd')] . "\">$i: {$trace['class']}{$trace['type']}{$trace['function']}() <i>{$trace['file']} line {$trace['line']}</i></span><br/>";
00052                         $i -= 1;
00053                 }
00054                 $output .= '</p></pre>';
00055                 return $output;
00056                 
00057         }
00058         
00059 }
